DeepSpiringMod:Sampling.NAME: Sampling
DESCRIPTIONS: At the #yend of the turn, play 1 card in your discard pile randomly.
At the #yend of the turn, play %d cards in your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:RecursionDepth.NAME: RecursionDepth
DESCRIPTIONS: When the number of stacks reaches #y20, stop all forward propagation and add an *Overflow in your hand.
